doc.field: Vincent J. Fontana collection of "thank you" letters
Vincent J. Fontana collection of "thank you" letters
Vincent J. Fontana collection of "thank you" letters
Vincent J. Fontana collection of "thank you" letters

Letters from • Rev. Joseph T. Cahill (1976 Jan. 22 + copies of 2 awards; 1982 Sept. 27) • Jimmy Carter (1980 Feb. 13) • John R. Crews (1954 March 4 + photo of Fontana with General "Wild Bill" Donovan, American Ambassador to Thailand) • Terrence J. Cooke (1966 Dec. 30; 1968 Feb. 21 + photocopy, March 7; 1969 Feb. 20, Oct. 21, Dec. 14; 1973 Oct. 15; 1976 Sept. 3, Nov. 23; 1977 Feb. 23, Apr. 30, July 7, Oct. 17; 1978 Jan. 23) • Mario M. Cuomo (1990 Oct. 19, photocopy) • Matilda Cuomo (1983 April 11; 1992 Feb. 27)
